projectGridLines.title: Title of project - JioCinema – Digital Martech
projectGridLines.description:
Title of project : JioCinema – Digital Martech

Brief Description of project :

Drive & coordinate with stakeholders from Product team for setting up the deep link for ads, event configurations, re-mktg. data pipeline on tools & SEO projects for JioCinema.

Project domain : (IT, Finance, etc.)

Digital marketing (Mar-tech)

Project area : OTT – Mobile & web

Discipline specialization : CSE/IT


Skill set required to execute the project (Technical)


Other soft skill competencies required

Strong in communication and ownership

Any specific courses that student should have taken 


Any other requirements :

Understanding of data and analytics would be a plus Expected learning (in bullet points)

Some elements of 

  • Mobile Measurement 
  • Data analytics
  • Onelink and deep linking
  • SEO
